meanings: (있던 곳에서 다른 곳으로) leave, (formal) depart, go off (to)
(출발하다) leave, start off, set off, (formal) depart, (차량이) pull out
go around the rim of one's ear
실용회화-관계가 안 좋을 때 Please don't leave without me.

vlive.korean: 행복해~ - 떠나지 마~ Please be happy. - Don't leave. 듣기 View video OSEN : Stray Kids 스트레이키즈, 게임에 정신없이 빠져버린 썰 #스타로드 12

vlive.korean: 떠나지 말래. - 근데 저 앵글 다리가 길어 보여. He said to not go! - His legs look long at this angle. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : MV Reaction - SUPER JUNIOR (슈퍼주니어) X REIK 'One More Time (Otra Vez)' MV
vlive.english: He said to not go! - His legs look long at this angle.

examples.korean: For years she was haunted by guilt. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여러 해 동안 그녀는 죄책감이 뇌리에서 떠나지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: For years she was haunted by guilt. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We didn’t leave early enough. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리가 충분히 일찍 떠나지를 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We didn’t leave early enough. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She tried to talk him out of leaving. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그가 떠나지 않도록 설득하려고 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She tried to talk him out of leaving. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I swear (that) I’ll never leave you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 난 결코 당신을 떠나지 않을 것을 맹세해요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I swear (that) I’ll never leave you. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We didn’t leave until the very end. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 완전히 끝날 무렵까지 떠나지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
